label: 元興寺
対訳語: A Buddhist temple, being one of the Shi-dai-ji and Shichi-dai-ji.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Formerly called the Hōkō-ji, located in Asuka, Takechi-no-kōri, Yamato-no-kuni. It was moved to Nara in 718. Thereafter the earlier temple at Asuka was called the original, or Hon-Gangō-ji, while the later one at Nara was called the new, or Shin-Gango-ji. [四大寺、七大寺、法興寺、飛鳥、高市郡、大和国、奈良、本元興寺、新元興寺]
